sentences.en: Do not leave off your overcoat; it is cold.
sentences.cn: 不要把你的大衣脱下, 天气很冷.

sentences.en: Do you think you can make over this old overcoat?
sentences.cn: 你是不是认为你能修改这件旧大衣 呢 ?

sentences.en: Hang your overcoat on the peg in the hall.
sentences.cn: 把你的大衣挂在门厅的挂衣钩上.

sentences.en: He burdened himself with a heavy overcoat.
sentences.cn: 他给自己加一件厚大衣.

sentences.en: He came into the room, his overcoat collar upturned.
sentences.cn: 他进屋时大衣领子向上翻起.

sentences.en: He disentangled his overcoat from the coat - hanger.
sentences.cn: 他从衣架上取下他的大衣.

sentences.en: He moved out from beneath an awning, reaching for something inside the breast of his overcoat.
sentences.cn: 他离开遮阳篷，手伸进大衣前胸部找东西。

sentences.en: He picked off the burs that had stuck to his overcoat.
sentences.cn: 他摘下粘在外衣上的刺果.

sentences.en: He placed his cap and overcoat on a chair.
sentences.cn: 他把帽子和大衣搁在一张椅子上。

sentences.en: He turned his overcoat collar up.
sentences.cn: 他把外套的衣领翻了起来.

sentences.en: I sprang 400 pounds for  her overcoat.
sentences.cn: 给她买那件大衣，我花了400镑。

sentences.en: I sprang 400 pounds for her overcoat.
sentences.cn: 给她买那件大衣，我花了400镑。

sentences.en: Is your overcoat made to order or ready made?
sentences.cn: 你的外套是定做的还是买现成的?

sentences.en: It was freezing out there even in his buttoned-up overcoat.
sentences.cn: 外面非常冷，即使穿上大衣扣上扣子也不顶事。

sentences.en: She removed all the grease stains from her overcoat.
sentences.cn: 她把她大衣上所有油渍都去掉了。

sentences.en: She very nearly tore my overcoat.
sentences.cn: 她差点把我的大衣扯破了。

sentences.en: Will you please help me on with my overcoat?
sentences.cn: 请帮我把大衣穿上好 吗 ?
